semantic_issues: The Borrow class is not associated with the Library class, which is necessary to represent the borrowing context.
The Borrow class should have a direct association with the Book class to indicate which book is being borrowed.
The Borrow class should have a reference to the User class to indicate which user is borrowing the book.
recommendations: Add an association from the Borrow class to the Library class to represent the context of borrowing.
Add an association from the Borrow class to the Book class to indicate which book is being borrowed.
Add an association from the Borrow class to the User class to indicate which user is borrowing the book.
